markdownRemark.html:
Git tags are used for establishing versions of products. They usually use Semver Versioning.

Because tags oftem specify specific changes in code, sometimes updates need to be added to specific tags. This update can be made in a few simple steps.

Establish tags

git tag

Delete tag

git push origin :refs/tags/[tag version]

Finally, re-create the tag by following your initial steps for setting up git tags.

frontmatter.meta: This post instructs how to update git tags after they've been pushed
frontmatter.title: Updating Git Tags That Have Been Pushed
